column9: How would you describe the pain you usually have in your hip?
column12: Have you had any sudden, severe pain (shooting, stabbing, or spasms) from your affected hip?
column15: Have you been troubled by pain from your hip in bed at night?
column18: Have you had any trouble with washing and drying yourself (all over) because of your hip?
column21: Have you had any trouble getting in and out of a car or using public transportation because of your hip?
column24: Have you been able to put on a pair of socks, stockings or tights?
column27: Could you do the household shopping on your own?
column30: How long have you been able to walk before the pain in your hip becomes severe (with or without a walking aid)?
column33: Have you been limping when walking because of your hip?
column36: Have you been able to climb a flight of stairs?
column39: After a meal (sat at a table), how painful has it been for you to stand up from a chair because of your hip?
column42: How much as pain from your hip interfered with your usual work, including housework?
